decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be completed in the materials specified on the approved plans and within the planning application form, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (L1112/2.3/01, L1112/2.1/07, L1112/2.1/17, L1112/2.1/18 received 16/12/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - No floodlighting of the all-weather playing surface shall be undertaken without prior written approval from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The all-weather playing surface hereby approved shall not be used outside the following hours: 06.00 - 21.00 Monday-Sunday, including Bank & Public Holidays.
description: Installation of an all-weather playing surface and erection of fencing as a means of enclosure
